title: What's your favorite skin that's less than 1350 RP?
body:
So if you ask someone something like "What's your favorite Sona skin?" chances are they'll answer either DJ or Arcade, and who can blame them? They're both her highest tier skins ~~and are more fanservicey than her others~~ so they tend to draw the most attention.

However, what about the less expensive skins? Some of us surely enjoy these lower tier skins more than the higher tier, right?

Myself, I vastly prefer Sweetheart and Pentakill Sona to Arcade or DJ, and I do realize they aren't as impressive, but it's a purely opinionated thing.

So what are some lower tier skins that hold a soft spot in your heart?
